text: Chloé Dufour-Lapointe (born December 2, 1991 in Montreal, Quebec) is a Canadian freestyle skier. She skied in the moguls events for Canada at the 2014 Winter Olympics in Sochi where she won a silver medal. Her sister Justine Dufour-Lapointe also won a gold medal in the event which was the first time that Canadian sisters stood together on the podium. She also competed at the 2010 Winter Olympics in Vancouver where she placed fifth on February 13, 2010. ==References== ==Other websites== *profile at the International Ski Federation * Category:1991 births Category:2010 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Canada Category:Canadian skiers Category:Living people Category:Medalists at the 2014 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Montreal
title: Chloé Dufour-Lapointe
